p: Seventeen compounds were identified in the EO of C. citriodora leaves (Table 2). The major constituents were α-citronellal (56.0%), α-citronellol (14.7%), citronellol acetate (12.3%), isopulegol (7.6%), eucalyptol (2.0%), citronellic acid (1.4%), caryophyllene oxide (1.2%), and (+)-rose oxide (1.2%).
